channel.title: Ready Fotografer on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Ready Fotografer on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Point, Shoot, and Forget
item.description: Today in Tedium: It took us about a hundred years to turn film processing (in most cases) from something that took a day or longer into something that was basically instantaneous. The fact is, while photography is a high art for a significant number of people, the masses wanted something simple that minimized the pain of taking photos—because they cared about the pictures more than the camera. They wanted something … well, disposable, that could “disappear” when they were done with it.
